name: Hammer Time! (BonkEmGames, jazzhar, Flower Hendice, Skittlequeen)
name_original: Hammer Time! (BonkEmGames, jazzhar, Flower Hendice, Skittlequeen)
description:
THE BASEMENT CONTAINS MORE THAN WHAT IS VISIBLE TO THE EYE ... Hammer Time! is a bullet hell game where you use the hammer to defeat the ominous demon that is lying down below. The one that came to life on this faithful day ...  Equipped with only a flashy, bouncy hammer, it's your goal to defeat the demon. Will you survive? Or will you succumb to the wrath of the fearful creature?

 

Flower Hendice 
 Skittle Queen Michinata  Jazzhar  LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Hammer Swing WASD - Move Around SHIFT - Run SPACEBAR - Jump
